name: Clocked Out (Beer Not Jam Entry)
description:
My entry for BeerSquadGaming's First Game Jam! And first solo project!

Instructions:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Collect All The Beer! Level gets harder the more you drink.

If you enjoy this check out my other project on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/Hourglass_Team

Credits:
Game/Music/Art/SFX developed by CafeLovai
Ambulance SFX by @MaleMaidCafe
All Fonts from Chevy Ray's Pixel Fonts on itch.io

And as always, drink responsibly ;)
